comment_body: I don't understand it... was it some sort of delayed time? Like the alert signal from their ship getting back to Earth and that's why they built the ship?

Much more simple:

The crew was sent to investigate odd signals coming from Titan. On their way there, there's a malfunction on the ship and Hank goes to fix it.

An accident happens and Hank's tether breaks, sending him off into space to his imminent death.
